archimate:BusinessObject.name: Business Object
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: In BizBOK Business Object is an explicit instance of an information concept In TOGAF Business Object is the Information Concept of BizBOK (Annahme StSutter 2.8.25) In Archimate A Business Object represents a concept used within a particular business domain.

properties.value: The way to represent business terms and semantics within the context of business architecture.
Represents a concept and its semantics used within the business.
